name: Panzanella
recipeYield: 6 main course servings or 12 side-dish servings
keywords: bread, tomato, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 5 large ripe tomatoes, cut into small dice
1 red onion, peeled and cut into small dice
1 tablespoon salt, plus more to taste
1 loaf stale, crusty French or Italian bread

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the tomatoes, onion, garlic, parsley and rosemary. Add the olive oil, red wine vinegar, orange rind, salt and pepper and mix well.

Slice the bread in half lengthwise. Pour on enough water to completely moisten. Let stand for 10 minutes. Squeeze out excess water. Finely chop the bread and toss it into the salad. Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.
